fields.description:
As a user, I want to be able to register for the system so that I can access its features and functionalities.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Provide clear error messages for any incorrect data entered during user registration.
* Ensure password strength requirements are enforced.
* Implement email verification for user registration.
* Include a confirmation email upon successful registration.
* Allow users to reset their passwords if forgotten.
* Implement CAPTCHA or other security measures to prevent automated registrations.
* Store user registration data securely in the system database.
* Enable users to update their registration information if needed.
* Implement logging for user registration activities for auditing purposes.

[https://www.loom.com/share/a2f4defd25a34f1b8b1a7cb404d56f2b?sid=2769c310-387e-4654-bd39-86b5948bc177|https://www.loom.com/share/a2f4defd25a34f1b8b1a7cb404d56f2b?sid=2769c310-387e-4654-bd39-86b5948bc177|smart-embed]

fields.description:
As a user, I want to securely log in to the system to access my account and ensure the protection of my personal information.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Include password strength validation to ensure users create secure passwords.
* Implement multi-factor authentication for an added layer of security.
* Provide error handling for incorrect login attempts to guide users on resolving issues.
* Enable users to reset their passwords securely in case of forgotten credentials.
* Implement session management to control user access and enhance security.
* Conduct regular security audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities.
* Encrypt sensitive user data both in transit and at rest to maintain confidentiality.
* Ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations to safeguard user privacy.
* Implement rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks on the login system.
* Log and monitor login activities for security analysis and incident response purposes.

[https://www.loom.com/share/b802964ab42c4c098198914325157c23?sid=ad4a392a-f234-4d57-82ca-f96fd5f8c053|https://www.loom.com/share/b802964ab42c4c098198914325157c23?sid=ad4a392a-f234-4d57-82ca-f96fd5f8c053|smart-embed]

fields.description:
As a user, I want to enhance security by implementing two-factor authentication.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Implement a secure mechanism for storing and handling authentication data.
* Ensure compatibility with a wide range of devices and platforms.
* Conduct thorough security testing to identify and address any vulnerabilities.
* Provide clear user instructions for setting up and using two-factor authentication.
* Monitor and log authentication attempts for security auditing purposes.
